QueryViewSpec.Name: Sponsorship Commitments With Multiple RG All Rankings Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Sponsorship Commitments With Multiple RG All Rankings Query
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: -- multiple commitments for same sponsorship commitment: with commitmentCounts (COMMITMENTLOOKUPID) as ( select distinct sc.LOOKUPID --r.LOOKUPID from dbo.sponsorship s1 join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc ON sc.ID = s1.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join revenuesplit rs on rs.ID = s1.REVENUESPLITID join REVENUE r on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID left join smartfield35EFF8A4CA954D9AA9BA012A8C82C5E3 ESSD on S1.CONSTITUENTID = ESSD.ID and (ESSD.VALUE is null OR (ESSD.VALUE is not null and ESSD.VALUE >= '1/1/2009')) where exists (select 1 from dbo.sponsorship s2 left join smartfield35EFF8A4CA954D9AA9BA012A8C82C5E3 ESSD2 on S2.CONSTITUENTID = ESSD2.ID and (ESSD2.VALUE is null OR (ESSD2.VALUE is not null and ESSD2.VALUE >= '1/1/2009')) where ((s1.revenuesplitid <> s2.revenuesplitid) and (s1.sponsorshipcommitmentid = s2.sponsorshipcommitmentid))) ) select distinct sc.ID, c.LOOKUPID as SPONSORLOOKUPID, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, COMMITMENTLOOKUPID, r.LOOKUPID as REVENUEID, s.STARTDATE, ESSD.VALUE from commitmentCounts cc join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc on sc.LOOKUPID = cc.COMMITMENTLOOKUPID --s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = sc.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID left join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on rs.ID = s.REVENUESPLITID left join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID left join dbo.REVENUE_EXT REX on REX.ID = r.ID -- ft.ID join dbo.constituent c on c.ID = s.constituentid left join smartfield35EFF8A4CA954D9AA9BA012A8C82C5E3 ESSD on S.CONSTITUENTID = ESSD.ID
